en_us: A crafting recipe pack that lets you craft all the records in a Custom Crafter.
Music Discs can be crafted with eight flint and a center item.
Records are crafted with a different center item:

Below is a list of items and their resulting disc:

Yellow Dye––------13
Green Dye—------Cat
Orange Dye----Blocks
Red Dye--------Chirp
Lime Dye---------Far

Purple Dye—–----Mall
Magenta Dye---Mellohi
Black Dye—------Stal
White Dye—-----Strad
Eye of Ender--- Ward
Coal—------------11
Light Blue Dye----Wait
